Class GoldenRule<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deliveredtechnologies.rulebook.model.GoldenRule<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the fact type
    U - the Result type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Rule<T,U>

    public class GoldenRule<T,U>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rule<T,U>
    A standard implementation of Rule.
